panels.description: Energy consumption of the SLURM jobs over time
panels.title: Energy Consumption

panels.description: Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time
panels.title: Energy Consumption

panels.description: Mean Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
(
sum(
    sum by (hostname) (power_consumption_per_cpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING"})
    )
+
(sum(
    sum by (hostname)(power_consumption_per_gpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) OR vector(0))
)

sum(
    sum by (hostname) (power_consumption_per_gpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname)((slurm_job_gpu_streaming_multiprocessor_usage >0)* on (jobid) group_right(hostname) 
                    slurm_job_info{jobid=~"$job_id",jobstate="RUNNING"})
    )

panels.title: Power Consumption

panels.description: Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
(
sum(
    sum by (hostname) (power_consumption_per_cpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING"})
    )
+
(sum(
    sum by (hostname)(power_consumption_per_gpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) OR vector(0))
)

sum(
    sum by (hostname) (power_consumption_per_gpu_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname)((slurm_job_gpu_streaming_multiprocessor_usage >0)* on (jobid) group_right(hostname) 
                    slurm_job_info{jobid=~"$job_id",jobstate="RUNNING"})
    )
